item.title: [INTC] Jim Cramer Says “Once They Cleaned Up the Balance Sheet, Intel Instantly Became a Much Better Story”

item.title: [BARC.L] Will humanoids be the growth engine of the 21st century?
item.description: Investing.com -- Humanoid robots are moving rapidly from experimental prototypes to real-world workers, a shift Barclays says could redefine global labor markets and industrial supply chains.

item.title: [AAPL] YouTuber MKBHD Hails Tesla Model Y Performance, Calls EV Giant's Self-Driving Technology 'The Best'
item.description: YouTuber Marques Brownlee, aka MKBHD, has shared his thoughts on the Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) Model Y Performance trim, as well as the company's self-driving technology. Tesla Self-Driving Is The Best Ever, MKBHD Says The YouTuber, in a review of the Model Y Performance on Thursday, hailed the crossover's software on the 16-inch touchscreen infotainment display, which is also a real-time representation of the car. item.title: [AAPL] Bank of America revamps Alphabet stock after Google enters two key partnerships
item.description: Investors are taking a fresh look at Google, as new partnerships tied to its Gemini models help push the stock higher. On Jan. 11, Google and Walmart (WMT) said they plan to roll out a new shopping experience inside Google’s Gemini chatbot, highlighting a potential new revenue path for Google. ...
